channel.title: Comments on: সবকিছু দূর্ঘটনাবশতঃ সৃষ্টি হয়েছে?
channel.description: জ্ঞান যেখানে সীমাবদ্ধ, যুক্তি যেখানে আড়ষ্ট, মুক্তি সেখানে অসম্ভব

item.title: By: Prometheus
item.dc:creator: Prometheus
item.description: Do you live in Banlgadesh? Because if live here you are risking your life to the highest order possible in a social sense. Please stay safe. Because this website is gem. It will help many young minds to build up the immunity from the worlds most infectious mental disease 'religion'. When Avijit roy and other bloggers died I was really shocked. Please we cant afford to bear more tragedies and discremination towards free thinkers. Just stay alert and safe. My Good wishes to you and your loved ones.

item.title: By: Md.Ashaduzzaman Chowdhury
item.dc:creator: Md.Ashaduzzaman Chowdhury
item.description: লেখাটি ছোট হলেও,বুঝতে অসুবিধে হলো না।
